import React, { useCallback, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Card, Collapsible, TextContainer, ButtonGroup, Scrollable } from "@shopify/polaris"; export default function CollapsibleExample() { const [active, setActive] = useState(true); const [active2] = useState(true); const handleToggle = useCallback(() => setActive(active => !active), []); const handleToggle2 = useCallback(() => setActive(active2 => !active), []); return (
